suggest.meta_keywords: Azion, Edge Application, Cache Policies, Image Optimization, Dynamic Content, Static File Optimization, Content Delivery, Deployment, CDN, Caching Rules
suggest.meta_description: Explore the Dynamic and Static File Optimization template on Azion to enhance content delivery with optimized caching rules and image processing using Azion as a CDN.

current.meta_description: This template helps you to deploy an application with standard cache policies to improve the delivery of your content.
